about_the_game:
About the Game

Immerse yourself in the erotic world of "Sex Instructor Yoga Vice City," a virtual reality full of passion and adventure. Step into Vice City, a town inspired by the sizzling heat of Miami, where yoga becomes a prelude to the most intimate experiences. As a sexy yoga instructor, you run a studio that attracts beautiful women seeking not only relaxation but also heated moments in your embrace.

Key Features

  • Your Yoga Studio: Invite sensual clients for yoga sessions that end in passionate encounters. Each session is a new opportunity to explore pleasure and erotic fantasies.
  • City Exploration: Leave your yoga studio to discover the hot spots of Vice City, filled with erotic adventures.
  • Nightclub: Enter the exclusive nightclub managed by a seductive boss who will eagerly invite you for intimate fun. Dance, party, and drink with beautiful women.
  • Music Club: Visit the music club where a charming Asian singer can perform just for you or skip straight to passionate moments.
  • Erotic Getaways: Take sexy Lola out of town to experience unforgettable erotic adventures filled with passion and pleasure.

Game Mechanics

  • Intimate Interactions: Use erotic toys to play with the girls and fulfill their deepest desires. Create sensual scenarios that will ignite your imagination and plunge you into a world of pure pleasure.
  • Advanced Physics: Experience realistic interactions thanks to advanced physics for lips and genitals, which can be stimulated with erotic toys.
  • Position Editing: Grab and adjust the characters' hands and legs, both during static scenes and animations, creating unique positions that fulfill your wildest fantasies.

content_descriptors.notes: Sex Instructor Yoga Vice City contains intense pornographic content and is intended for adults only (18+). This game offers sensual adventures and realistic interactions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 2060 (or equivalent)
